item.title: Zen of Open Source
item.description: Open philosophy When can a project be defined as open-source? When, as the word says, you open the source code and make it available to other people. Of course, this is the first concept behind the open-source philosophy. But there is more. Open source license To make a project open-source first, you need to release it with a certain license. In fact, there are a lot of them. They all share the main philosophy, but differ from each other in small points.
